UseCanonicalName Off DocumentRoot /var/www/vhosts/salman/s1.salman.pp.ua/httpdocs # this combined log format is understandable by webalizer... some other formats are not recognised by webalizer.. thats why, specified here explicitly.. LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\"" combined LogFormat "%v:%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\"" vhost_combined CustomLog /var/www/vhosts/salman/s1.salman.pp.ua/logs/access_log combined CustomLog /var/log/apache_common_access_log vhost_combined # this is pear compatible: php_admin_value open_basedir "/var/www/vhosts/salman/s1.salman.pp.ua:/usr/share/php:/usr/share/pear" php_admin_value upload_tmp_dir /var/www/vhosts/salman/s1.salman.pp.ua/phptmpdir php_admin_value session.save_path /var/www/vhosts/salman/s1.salman.pp.ua/phptmpdir AccessFileName .htaccess ServerName webmail.s1.salman.pp.ua ServerAlias mail.s1.salman.pp.ua ServerAlias email.s1.salman.pp.ua DocumentRoot /var/www/new/ehcp/webmail LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\"" combined LogFormat "%v:%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\"" vhost_combined CustomLog /var/www/vhosts/salman/s1.salman.pp.ua/logs/access_log combined CustomLog /var/log/apache_common_access_log vhost_combined php_admin_value open_basedir /var/www/new/ehcp/webmail php_admin_value upload_tmp_dir /var/www/new/ehcp/webmail/data php_admin_value session.save_path /var/www/new/ehcp/webmail/data ServerName webmail2.s1.salman.pp.ua ServerAlias mail2.s1.salman.pp.ua ServerAlias email2.s1.salman.pp.ua DocumentRoot /var/www/new/ehcp/webmail2 LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\"" combined LogFormat "%v:%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\"" vhost_combined CustomLog /var/www/vhosts/salman/s1.salman.pp.ua/logs/access_log combined CustomLog /var/log/apache_common_access_log vhost_combined ServerName cpanel.s1.salman.pp.ua ServerAlias panel.s1.salman.pp.ua ServerAlias ehcp.s1.salman.pp.ua ServerAlias cp.s1.salman.pp.ua DocumentRoot /var/www/new/ehcp LogFormat "%v:%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\"" vhost_combined CustomLog /var/log/apache_common_access_log vhost_combined php_admin_value open_basedir /var/www/new/ehcp #____________end of s1.salman.pp.ua__paneluser:salman_reseller:admin_id:28____________
